EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations, {!Contact.FirstName}! Your place on NCS is confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Congratulations!
{!Contact.FirstName}’s place on NCS is booked, starting on {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_KO_Day__c}. We’ll send you a programme information pack approximately one month before this. We’ll also invite you to an information evening a few weeks before your NCS programme starts.
The dates will be on NCS are: Part 1 - Get Active Staying away from home: {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_KO_Day__c} until {!Wave_Selection__c.PC_Return_Day__c}
Part 2 - Get Involved Staying away from home: {!Wave_Selection__c.TC_KO_Day__c} until {!Wave_Selection__c.TC_End_Day__c}
Part 3 - Make Your Mark {!Wave_Selection__c.RCD_paragraph_part_1_new__c} {!Wave_Selection__c.RCD_paragraph_part_2_new__c}
{!Wave_Selection__c.RCA_paragraph_part_1_new__c} {!Wave_Selection__c.RCA_paragraph_part_2_new__c}
{!Wave_Selection__c.Non_Pilot_RCA_end_info_text__c}
[Find out more about what will happen on {!Contact.FirstName}’s programme by clicking here]
If these dates don't work for {!Contact.FirstName}, please click here to see your next steps.
[Search for more information about NCS]
We are really looking forward to seeing {!Contact.FirstName} on NCS.
Yours sincerely,
The NCS Team - The Challenge
Phone: 0203 542 2400 Email: contact@ncsthechallenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 9am - 3pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
